author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Mix the oats, orange juice, sunflower seeds and pumpkin seeds together in a bowl and set aside for 15 minutes, or until the oats have soaked up all the juice. Divide the oat mixture between two small glasses, then add a layer of banana. Spoon in the yoghurt, then top with the berries.
ingredients: 50g/2oz rolled oats,  50ml/2fl oz orange juice,  1 tsp sunflower seeds,  1 tsp pumpkin seeds,  1 small banana, sliced,  60g/2¼oz Greek-style yoghurt,  60g/2¼oz mixed berries
